attributes.action: take another look at your equal opportunities law as it is still discriminating against young males
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like the government to look at their equal opportunities law as young people and males are being discriminated against and no one cares young males cant get decent priced car insurance but women can men cant even get car insurance with some places but women can get it wherever and at reasonable prices people who love driving who are between 17 and 21 cant do what they love because companies wont take them on and car insurance is to dear i think the government should base car insurance and jobs on individual merit and not age and gender

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
